info.title: Forecast
info.description: Get 16 days weather forecast data - worldwide - geographical coordinates...
info.x-long-description:
---- For the past 15 years we have been collecting and analyzing weather data with our own meteorological unit, to provide the most accurate forecast possible for any given location in the world. We believe that weather is still an under-valued key business component. With this API  you can enrich and improve your website or trigger any event based on high accurate weather forecast ---

--- This API provides weather forecasts worldwide: for a given location (latitude/longitude), you can get weather forecasts on daily (free) or hourly level for the next 16 days and weather stations historical data: up to 1 year--- 

--- Looking for ZIPCODE weather data? We offer lat/lon weather data but you can do an easy match with open data here: https://public.opendatasoft.com/explore/dataset/geonames-postal-code/table/?refine.country_code=DE (available for all countries) ---

--- Looking for historical data? Check-out our History API: https://rapidapi.com/wettercom-wettercom-default/api/history3---

--- But that is not all! We also collect and analyze a lot of other data not available via the API. Just shoot us a short email (info@meteonomiqs.com) to get the full catalog and pricing.---

List of all available info:

Hourly data: Up to 16 days
 - prec sum[mm]: Total precipitation
 - prec sumAsRain[mm]: Total rainfall (In future version)
 - prec class: Precipitation class
 - prec probability[%]: Precipitation probability
 - snow line [m]: (In future version)
 - clouds high [%]: High clouds cover
 - clouds middle [%]: Middle clouds cover
 - clouds low [%]: Low clouds cover
 - weather state: Description of the weather (in German)
 - freshSnow [mm]: Snow fall (In future version)
 - sun hours [h]: Sun hours (In summary)
  - rain hours [h]: Rain hours (In future version)
  - wind direction: Wind direction
  - avg wind [km/h]: Average wind speed
  - min wind [km/h]: Minimal wind speed (In summary)
  - max wind [km/h]: Maximal wind speed (In summary)
  - wind gusts [km/h]: Maximal wind gust speed
  - pressure [hPa]: Air pressure
  - average temperature [C]: Average temperature
  - min windchill [C]: Minimum windchill (In summary)
  - max windchill [C]: Maximum windchill (In summary)
  - avg windchill [C]: Average windchill
  - relativeHumidity [%]: Relative humidity
  - isNight: Wheater the hour is during night or not

summary: One day
  - date: Date of the start time of the day in UTC
  - dateWithTimezone: Start time of the day in UTC
  - prec sum[mm]: Total precipitation
  - prec sumAsRain[mm]: Total rainfall (In future version)
  - prec class: Precipitation class
  - prec probability[%]: Precipitation probability
  - snow line avg [m]: (In future version)
  - snow line min [m]: (In future version)
  - snow line max [m]: (In future version)
  - weather state: Description of the weather (in German)
  - freshSnow [mm]: Snow fall (In future version)
  - snowHeight [mm]: Snow height (In future version)
  - sunHours [h]: Sun hours
  - rain hours [h]: Rain hours (In future version)
  - wind direction: Wind direction
  - avg wind [km/h]: Average wind speed (In hourly)
  - min wind [km/h]: Minimal wind speed
  - max wind [km/h]: Maximal wind speed
  - wind gusts [km/h]: Maximal wind gust speed (In hourly)
  - avg temperature [C]: Average temperature (In hourly)
  - min temperature [C]: Minimum temperature
  - max temperature [C]: Maximum temperature
  - min windchill [C]: Minimum windchill
  - max windchill [C]: Maximum windchill
  - avg windchill [C]: Average windchill (In hourly)
  - dawn: Time of dawn
  - sunrise: Time of sunrise
  - suntransit: Time of suntransit
  - sunset: Time of sunset
  - dusk: Time of dusk
  - moonrise: Time of moonrise
  - moontransit: Time of moontransit
  - moonset: Time of moonset
  - moonphase: Moonphase (1: New Moon, 2: Waxing crescent, 3: First Quarter, 4: Waxing gibbous, 5: Full Moon, 6: Waning gibbous, 7: Last Quarter, 8: Waning crescent)
  - moonzodiac: Moonzodiac (1: Aries, 2: Taurus, 3: Gemini, 4: Cancer, 5: Leo, 6: Virgo, 7: Libra, 8: Scorpio, 9: Sagittarius, 10: Capricorn, 11: Aquarius, 12: Pisces)

# Response Codes

List of response codes returned by wetter.com API

### 2xx Success
Status Code | Status Message
------------|----------------
200 | OK
204 | No Content

### 3xx Redirection
Status Code | Status Message
------------|----------------
301 | Moved Permanently
304 | Not Modified

### 4xx Client errors
Status Code | Status Message
------------|----------------
400 | Bad Request
401 | Unauthorized
403 | Forbidden
404 | Not Found
405 | Method Not Allowed
406 | Not Acceptable
409 | Conflict
429 | Too Many Requests

### 5xx Server errors
Status Code | Status Message
------------|----------------
500 | Internal Server Error

clouds.description: Cloudage in % (high clouds, low clouds, middle clouds)

text.description: Short weather text for calculated interpretation

nextUpdate.description: Date of next update format YYYY-mm-ddTHH:MM:SS

latitude.description: Value between -90 and 90. Latitude as decimal degrees (up to 5 decimals)

longitude.description: Value between -180 and 180. Longitude as decimal degrees (up to 5 decimals)
